page.title: 02AMENITIES
page.content:
AT ROMMANO BRIDGE THERE IS AN INN AND AT BLYTH BRIDGE AN INN AND A RETAURANT. THE RIVER LYNE GIVES GOOD FISHING. THERE IS A PLAY-PARK FOR SMALL CHILDREN AT BLYTH BRIDGE.
AT THE VILLAGE HALL MEETINGS OF COMMUNITY COUNCIL, THE PLAY GROUP, THE ANNUAL BULB SHOW, THE WOMEN'S RURAL INSTITUTE, THE WOMEN'S GUILD AND THE COTTAGERS' PRODUCE SHOW TAKE PLACE.
NEWLANDS SCHOOL IS USED IN THE EVENINGS BY THE BROWNIES, THE ROYAL ODSERVER CORPS AND SOMETIMES FOR DRESS-MAKING AND KEEP FIT CLASSES AND THE COMPUTER CLUB.
A MOBILE LIBRARY CALLS EVERY TWO WEEKS.
